block.p: BECTON, DICKINSON & CO., Franklin Lakes, N.J., named John Considine chief financial officer, succeeding Kenneth Weisshaar, who left. Mr. Considine had been senior vice president for finance at American Home Products.
HILTON GROUP, London, named David Michels, chief executive at Hilton International, as chief executive. He succeeds Peter George.

BECTON, DICKINSON & CO., Franklin Lakes, N.J., named John Considine chief financial officer, succeeding Kenneth Weisshaar, who left. Mr. Considine had been senior vice president for finance at American Home Products.
HILTON GROUP, London, named David Michels, chief executive at Hilton International, as chief executive. He succeeds Peter George.
iMEDIATION, Palo Alto, Calif., named Bill Miller president and chief operating officer. He had been director for content and commerce ventures at Intel Capital, the venture investing arm of Intel.
